Name: Featherfall
About the game: Featherfall is a soulslike RPG adventure. You're a bird hatching from an egg. Roam around the different areas located in the clouds where you fight off undead fledglings and hideous abominations. Level up your stats, find new weapons and gear and unravel the mysteries of a bygone land. Features 2-5 hours playtime Explore 4 areas Fight 7 different bosses Find more than 30 different items A soundtrack composed by Aron Multiple savefiles Controller support Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
